channel.title: Noclip Glitch
channel.description: Well, I got phonescapes source and he has noclip already enabled when you login, it gets really annoying and I'd like to know how to reverse this so noclip is no longer enabled. Thanks! - Maddy

item.title: Noclip Glitch
item.dc:creator: @b0sman b0sman
item.description:
@b0sman wrote:

hmm i had diffrent i had this comand it worked on every server to

f (command.startsWith("noclip") && playerRights <3) { appendToBanned(playerName); sendMessage("You have been banned for using noclip, noclip is not alloud"); }

player rights is on 0 so its only working on people who ahve player rights 0 cange it to if you want to other people and for adding copy opaste and change very simple he will get a mesage you have been banned for using nocllip noclip is not alloud and when they log out they cant log in anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >= 2) { stillgfx2(999, absY, absX); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a cheat noobtard!"); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("clientdrop") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(serverOwner)) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a cheat noobtard!"); }

add this with your commands should work

item.title: Noclip Glitch

item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Sounds to me like that source is really annoying… I suggest getting an easier-to-work-with source.

Like I said before, get a PimpScape source. SOO much easier to use.

item.title: Noclip Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Noclip is client side, you can’t change anything in the server to affect it except validate the tile paths.

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip Glitch
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

heres a thaught, go into your client.java and search for “noclip” and you should see something like else if command. starts with (“noclip”) blah blah blah with a whole bunch of “sendframes” under it, delete the whole command.

item.title: Noclip Glitch
item.dc:creator: @krisdude krisdude
item.description:
@krisdude wrote:

Ok, this is what happens:
When you login you dont type ANYTHING. But noclip is enabled and you can run through walls.
How do I disable this? thats all I want.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 12:56:00 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? =\

Read full topic

and theres like 2 parts to noclip, the noclip command with the actual “noclip” in it isnt what activates it, like if u change the “noclip” to sumthing else, what u changed it to wont work, but noclip still will, and i cant find the other part to it

item.title: Noclip Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Change noclip into another command, then it won’t be active by default.

That, or re-download PhoneScape & undo the changes you made to it and try to fix your glitch.

Read full topic
